messages:
Name: Selçuk Sahin
Nationality: Turkey
Date of Birth: January 31, 1981
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Bursaspor
1. Lig clubs played for: Hatayspor, Gençlerbirliği, Bursaspor
Midfielder Selçuk Sahin plays for Bursaspor and is yet to be involved in any of the four games that his side have played in the 1. Lig so far in 2020/2021.
The last 1. Lig appearance that Sahin made came on July 18, 2020 for Bursaspor against Hatayspor; a game that he played 65 minutes in during a 3-1 defeat.
Bursaspor find themselves 11th in the league standings with four points and next face a home match against Balıkesirspor in 1. Lig action on October 18.
In last season's 1. Lig, Sahin featured in 18 games for Bursaspor and scored two goals.
Sahin linked up with Bursaspor in September 2019 from Gençlerbirliği, for whom he made 72 league appearances in total, scoring six goals and providing six assists.
